name: Phase Viscosity Refinement
description: Improve Down/Strange quark mass prediction accuracy using topological interaction energy.

hypothesis.H0: Topological interaction terms (functions of crossing numbers) do not significantly reduce MAE for Down/Strange quarks.
hypothesis.H1: Interaction energy or non-linear volume deficits can reduce fermion mass MAE below 5.17%.

data_requirements.description: KnotInfo data and SSoT fermion masses.

test_method: Parameter estimation via least squares/Bayesian optimization and LOO-CV validation.
